ISSUE.TITLE: When using the RoxyFileMan - Preview Images creates Error
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: v4.6 Steps to reproduce the problem: Use TinyMce Enable - Admin area. HTML Editor. Manage pictures (Could not do on your Demo Website to double check issue) Edit Product - Full Description Insert image and Browse server Select an image Preview Image or Right mouce click Preview ![RoxyFileMan - Preview](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34350154/219463158-89b51aad-84ee-4d1a-b188-d9d027dc5f51.png) **Error** This localtest46.selectsystems.com.au page canâ€™t be found No web page was found for the web address: https://localtest46.selectsystems.com.au/0003986.png HTTP ERROR 404 Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/94892/roxy-fileman-error-4503/page/2#303942
